ModMetaData.name: Save the Ship
ModMetaData.author: Mathus
ModMetaData.description:
Launched ships are saved to disk and can be landed on new worlds. Also allows building ships with interiors.
Start a new game with pawns and items from previous games
items should be placed on shelves or into containers. zones and storage areas not retained during save process.
Based on Save Our Ship by Kentington and Save Our Ship (Reloaded) by pipakin
